resources.title: oeLucasPellisoliRecentlyViewedProductsDisplay Settings
resources.helpTextmaxItems: This configuration must accept numerical values only.
resources.helpTextitemsPerRowLargeDesktop: This configuration must accept numerical values only.
resources.helpTextitemsPerRowDesktop: This configuration must accept numerical values only.
resources.helpTextitemsPerRowTablet: This configuration must accept numerical values only.

resources.labelmaxItems: Represents the maximum number of items to request
resources.labelitemsPerRowLargeDesktop: Represents the number items to show in each group on Large Desktop breakpoint
resources.labelitemsPerRowDesktop: Represents the number items to show in each group on Desktop breakpoint
resources.labelitemsPerRowTablet: Represents the number items to show in each group on Tablet breakpoint
resources.labelitemsPerRowMobile: Represents the number items to show in each group on Mobile breakpoint
